title: Adidas Shirt
shortDescription: Shirt adidas Performance HT SS SHIRT 3 is made of thin fabrics. Details: straight leg; buttoned; turn-down collar with button-down corners; patch pocket.
fullDescription: Shirt adidas Performance HT SS SHIRT 3 is made of thin fabrics. Details: straight leg; buttoned; turn-down collar with button-down corners; patch pocket.

title: Armani Pants
shortDescription: Trousers home Emporio Armani are made from lightweight jersey with a soft inner layer. Features: elastic waistband, two front pockets.
fullDescription: Trousers home Emporio Armani are made from lightweight jersey with a soft inner layer. Features: elastic waistband, two front pockets.

title: Armani T-shirt
shortDescription: Emporio Armani T-shirt made of cotton jersey. straight silhouette model. Features rounded neckline, textured brand logo on the chest.
fullDescription: Emporio Armani T-shirt made of cotton jersey. straight silhouette model. Features rounded neckline, textured brand logo on the chest.

title: Armani Longsleeve
shortDescription: Longsleeve  Emporio Armani is made of cotton jersey. Features: a round neckline, long sleeves, a contrast brand logo.
fullDescription: Longsleeve  Emporio Armani is made of cotton jersey. Features: a round neckline, long sleeves, a contrast brand logo.

title: Ice Iceberg Shirt
shortDescription: Men's denim shirt from Ice Iceberg. The model is made of soft denim blue. Features: straight leg, turn-down collar, strap on buttons, patch chest pockets, cuffs fixed buttons, shaped hem, decorated with scuffed and contrast stitching.
fullDescription: Men's denim shirt from Ice Iceberg. The model is made of soft denim blue. Features: straight leg, turn-down collar, strap on buttons, patch chest pockets, cuffs fixed buttons, shaped hem, decorated with scuffed and contrast stitching.

title: Bikkembergs T-shirt
shortDescription: Bikkembergs T-shirt is made of natural cotton jersey. straight silhouette model. Features: Elastic round neckline, contrast print.
fullDescription: Bikkembergs T-shirt is made of natural cotton jersey. straight silhouette model. Features: Elastic round neckline, contrast print.

title: Bikkembergs roll-neck
shortDescription: Bikkembergs Turtleneck made of thin fabrics. Features: stand-up collar, raglan sleeves, elastic cuffs and bottom.
fullDescription: Bikkembergs Turtleneck made of thin fabrics. Features: stand-up collar, raglan sleeves, elastic cuffs and bottom.

title: Bikkembergs Jeans
shortDescription: Jeans premium brand Bikkembergs made of slightly stretch denim. Features: zip with buttons, three front pockets, two rear pockets, belt loops.
fullDescription: Jeans premium brand Bikkembergs made of slightly stretch denim. Features: zip with buttons, three front pockets, two rear pockets, belt loops.

title: Bikkembergs T-shirt
shortDescription: Shirt premium brand Bikkembergs is made of a soft cotton cloth. Model straight cut. Features: Printed logo and the inscription with the brand name, round neckline, short sleeves.
fullDescription: Shirt premium brand Bikkembergs is made of a soft cotton cloth. Model straight cut. Features: Printed logo and the inscription with the brand name, round neckline, short sleeves.

title: Bikkembergs jacket
shortDescription: Bikkembergs The jacket is made from genuine sheep skin. Features: straight cut, soft viscose lining, zip and two zipped side pockets, decorative vertical zipper, cuffs with zippers, one inner pocket.
fullDescription: Bikkembergs The jacket is made from genuine sheep skin. Features: straight cut, soft viscose lining, zip and two zipped side pockets, decorative vertical zipper, cuffs with zippers, one inner pocket.
